an9.69:1: "Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, macchariyāni. Katamāni pañca? Āvāsamacchariyaṁ, kulamacchariyaṁ, lābhamacchariyaṁ, vaṇṇamacchariyaṁ, dhammamacchariyaṁ – imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca macchariyāni.
an9.69:2: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ macchariyānaṁ pahānāya … pe … ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvetabbā"ti.
